Contribution
=====================================

If you use scripts/methods in this packpage for your research, please make sure to cite:

Cite methods: 
- ApThermo: Li, W. & Costa, F. 2020. GCA. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.gca.2019.10.035
- ApREE2O3: Li, W., Costa, F, Oppenheimer, C. & Nagashima, K. in review 

Cite pyAp: 
- v1.0 (current version): Li and Zhang (2022)
